mapper.insert: INSERT INTO human_task (doc_num, name, orde_id, order_type, role, `status`, `type`, user, create_user, create_time, last_modify_user, last_modify_time) VALUES (#{docNum}, #{name}, #{ordeId}, #{orderType}, #{role}, #{status}, #{type}, #{user}, #{createUser}, NOW(), #{lastModifyUser}, NOW())
